Class MyCalendar

java.lang.Object
MyCalendar
public class MyCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
The MyCalendar class is the engine of the entire code. It has all the functions that are required to print the events, delete events, create event, import text file, export text file, portray month or day views, and all other helper functions to organize code.
